characters.name: Athanasia de Alger Obelia
characters.description:
Athanasia de Alger Obelia is the main protagonist of the manhwa "Who Made Me a Princess" as well as the first princess and only heir to the Obelian Empire. After reading a book named "The Lovely Princess" on a shunned princess named Athanasia, the protagonist falls asleep with sleeping pills and finds herself in the infant body of Athanasia from the book.

Athanasia, also known as "Athy", is the daughter of the emperor Claude de Alger Obelia and Diana, a dancer he deflowered after meeting at a royal banquet. Claude's harem previously occupied the Ruby Palace, however, he massacred them when Diana died giving birth to Athy.

Athy makes her goal in her new life to avoid the execution of the previous Athanasia on her 18th birthday.

characters.name: Claude de Alger Obelia
characters.description:
Claude de Alger Obelia is the current reigning emperor of the Empire of Obelia, and the father of the main protagonist in the popular manhwa "Who Made Me a Princess". He is a book character in "The Lovely Princess", and kills his oldest blood-related daughter, the original Athanasia de Alger Obelia. Claude has been shown to be ruthless and cruel, yet also warm and affectionate later on in the story. 

In the book "The Lovely Princess", Claude gains the throne by usurping and murdering his older brother, Anastacius de Alger Obelia. His name, Claude, refers to his illegitimacy to become heir, as heirs to the Obelian Empire have names which means "immortal".

characters.name: Lucas
characters.description: A royal magician working at the black tower and Athanasia de Alger Obelia's chosen playmate.

characters.name: Ijekiel Alpheus
characters.description:
Ijekiel Alpheus is the oldest son of the House of Alpheus. He is the male lead in _The Lovely Princess_, ending up as [Jennette](https://anilist.co/character/143630/Jennette-Margarita)'s fiance at the end of the original story. He is disliked by [Claude de Alger Obelia](https://anilist.co/character/136776/Claude-de-Alger-Obelia) and refers to [Athanasia de Obelia](https://anilist.co/character/143632/Athanasia-de-Alger-Obelia) as "Lady Angel" due to the circumstances of their first and second encounters.

(Source: Who Made Me Princess Wikia)

characters.name: Jennette Margarita
characters.description:
Jennette was the original protagonist of the book "The Lovely Princess" from the manhwa "Who Made Me a Princess", until the main protagonist of the series transmigrates into the body of Athanasia de Alger Obelia. She is a side character and views Athanasia with admiration.

(Source: Who Made Me Princess Wikia)

characters.name: Felix Robane
characters.description:
Felix Robane is a side character in the manhwa "Who Made Me a Princess", and serves as the main protagonist's personal guard. He is first seen in chapter six when Claude de Alger Obelia first meets Athanasia de Alger Obelia. He is assigned the role of Athanasia's personal guard when she is 5, and soon becomes quite close with her.

Felix's mother was Claude's nanny, and the two were raised as bosom brothers.

(Source: Who Made Me Princess Wikia)

characters.name: Roger Alpheus
characters.description: Roger Alpheus is Ijekiel Alpheus' father and the head of House Alpheus, the duke family who raised Jennette Margarita.

characters.name: Anastacius de Alger Obelia
characters.description:
Anastacius de Alger Obelia is the older brother of Claude de Alger Obelia and originally the official crown prince.

~! He is [Jennette Margarita's](https://anilist.co/character/143630/Jennette-Margarita) biological father. !~

characters.name: Lilian York
characters.description:
Lilian York is Athy's main caregiver, as well as being the head maid. Despite being aware of the Ruby Palace incident, she still volunteers to be Athy's nanny due to an admiration of Diana's free spirit.

The two share a close bond in both the book "The Lovely Princess" and the manhwa itself. ~!Their bond is so strong that Lilian died while protecting Athanasia from her execution.!~ Lilian is shown to be a loyal and affectionate caretaker, with Athanasia reciprocating those feelings.

(Source: Who Made Me Princess Wikia)

characters.name: Diana
characters.description:
Diana is a dancer who died whilst giving birth to Athanasia. She is mainly depicted as "fairy-like" and graceful, and has no recorded contact with Athanasia in the manhwa other than brief dreams where Athy sees her mother interacting with Claude (and vice-versa).

In a sense, Diana saves Athy from death during the Ruby Palace massacre and secures her place as Obelia's next heir by giving her child the name "Athanasia", which Claude found humorous. Athy is often told she possesses similar traits to her mother in both looks and personality.

(Source: Who Made Me Princess Wikia)

characters.name: Penelope Judith
characters.description: Penelope Judith is the mother of Jennette Margarita and Claude de Alger Obelia's former fiancée.
